content: This document represents my professional portfolio. It includes a selective part of both personal and assigned works which I had the honor to be part of and the opportunity to grow through them.

All projects differ in substance, assigners, complexity and requirements. They have been developed in times of changing web technologies (2008 â€” till now). Some of them, though outdated, are still functional, while others have been modified or replaced by newer versions.

content.name: a17
content.title: Switchboard A17
content.description: A personal app for helping me use the home electrical distribution board

content.title: BaseHeight
content.description: Equal heights for set of responsive columns

content.title: JumboSlider

content.name: stickme
content.title: StickMe
content.description: Fixed elements depending on the scroll position

content.title: LightLayer
content.description: A simple responsive lightbox & dialog script

content.title: MemoryRoll
content.description: Smart sequence loop starting from a random number
